short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JSTOR DDA DoubleChecker finds and flags titles in GOBI based on ISBNs in our JSTOR DDA holdings for UC Davis

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JSTOR DDA DoubleChecker finds and flags titles in GOBI based on ISBNs in our JSTOR DDA holdings for UC Davis.

Using ISBNs as a match-point, this browser extension will find titles in GOBI that are part of the CDL JSTOR DDA, and will flag them by replacing the ISBN with "[ISBN-13]******JSTOR DDA**************" which should make it easier for Selectors and Acq Staff to quickly ID titles in the DDA profile and avoid purchasing. 

Make sure that your GOBI Preferences are set to ISBN-13, not ISBN-10 - the extension only finds ISBN-13 (Options > My Preferences, and select the ISBN-13/EAN option under ISBN Format).

Titles may have multiple print or electronic alt eds, so all versions may not be flagged. 

The extension only works on gobi3.com, so there is no need to worry about other pages being modified. 

Please let me know if you experience any issues!

Big Thanks to Ian Knabe for sharing code.

Email:  ianknabe@berkeley.edu
